source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.
source_objects.title: Management

items.title: Scrum Fundamentals Certified Prep Course

visible_instructors.name: SCRUMstudy
visible_instructors.job_title: (Global Training Provider)
visible_instructors.title: SCRUMstudy Certification

items.headline: This is an instructor-led online class that helps you prepare for the SFC certification exam.
objectives_summary: Scrum Fundamentals Certified (SFC™) course is tailored to help anyone interested to know more about Scrum; learn about key concepts in Scrum as defined in the SBOK™ Guide; and to get a basic understanding of how Scrum framework works in delivering successful projects.

After attending this training, participants can take the SFC™ certification exam (which is a one hour unproctored exam with forty multiple choice questions), and get the highly valued SFC™ credential.

items.title: Leading Effective Meetings: Beginner's Guide

visible_instructors.name: Markus
visible_instructors.title: Markus Amanto
visible_instructors.job_title: Author. Speaker. Trainer.

items.headline: Learn how to successfully lead meetings that boost motivation and productivity while using time effectively
objectives_summary: Plan a meeting including who to invite and why, meeting duration and any preparation needed
Create an agenda for the meeting that boosts engagement, makes good use of time and achieves the results desired
Lead well structured meetings including how to start, improve participation and how to end

items.title: BPMN Process Analysis using Microsoft Visio Professional

visible_instructors.name: Dave
visible_instructors.job_title: University Lecturer
visible_instructors.title: Dave Murphy

items.headline: Business Analyst Guide to Business Process Modelling with BPMN and Microsoft Visio Professional
objectives_summary: You will be able to construct BPMN models using Visio Professional
You will be proficient in building process models using the BPMN template in Visio Professional
You will understand the important elements of the BPMN standard and be able to apply them in business process analysis projects

label.display_name: BPMN Business Process Model and Notation
label.title: BPMN Business Process Model and Notation

items.title: How To Make Better, Faster Decisions At Work

visible_instructors.name: Erik
visible_instructors.title: Erik Larson
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO/Founder, Cloverpop

items.headline: Learn science-based skills to defeat biases, boost performance, gain confidence and become a better leader!
objectives_summary: Use practical, scientifically-proven tips to make better, faster team decisions at work.
Increase awareness of common decision biases and how to reduce their effects.
Efficiently include broad input from the right people in team decisions.

items.title: AMAZING Change Management Plan

visible_instructors.name: Susan
visible_instructors.job_title: Author and Trainer: PRINCE2, MSP, APM & Change Management
visible_instructors.title: Susan Tuttle

items.headline: Create your own comprehensive Change Plan
objectives_summary: Create a comprehensive Change Plan with strategies to overcome resistance and to achieve success
Understand change theories from the Micro level (Individual change) and the Macro level (Organisational change)
Apply different Change Theories that are relevant to the types of changes you are trying to implement

items.title: Effective Delegation

visible_instructors.name: LearnSmart
visible_instructors.job_title: Smarter Training. Never Open a Textbook.
visible_instructors.title: LearnSmart LLC

items.headline: Master staff development through assigning tasks.
objectives_summary: Upon completion of this course, you will be able to develop your staff through assigning and delegating tasks.
You will build a better professional relationship with your staff and you will encourage them to perform well by giving them ownership of the task.
Your staff will be more responsive, and at the same time, they will have gained new skills in the process.

items.title: New Manager's Five-week Success System: 25 Days > Management

visible_instructors.name: Mike
visible_instructors.job_title: Real World Trainer in Personal Effectiveness
visible_instructors.title: Mike Clayton

items.headline: You will succeed, with the 25 most important management skills and 100 top new manager tools, actions and behaviours.
objectives_summary: Handle themselves and be seen by peers and their bosses as managers, rather than as capable doers.
Present, solve problems, manage their time, and deal with colleagues in a confident, assertive way.
Manage the people in their group or team, setting effective goals, delegating, and giving feedback.

Form great communication and leadership habits to inspire your team

Learn why every single employee should understand the business.
